feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:19 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 12:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa steady
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
